plot: Empowered by black blood, Crona proves difficult to defeat. With their survival on the line, Maka and Soul push themselves to the brink of madness.
title: Sôru îtâ" Kuro chi no kyoumei ikusa. Kyoufu ni hamukau chiisa-na tamashii no dai funto?
plot_es: Empowered by black blood, Crona proves difficult to defeat. With their survival on the line, Maka and Soul push themselves to the brink of madness.
original_name: Sôru îtâ" Kuro chi no kyoumei ikusa. Kyoufu ni hamukau chiisa-na tamashii no dai funto?
